description.tooltip: Analyse de l'utilisation du cache de plans
description.label: Test

queries.query: SELECT cp.cacheobjtype, cp.objtype, st.text, qp.query_plan FROM sys.dm_exec_cached_plans AS cp WITH (NOLOCK) CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_sql_text(plan_handle) st CROSS APPLY sys.dm_exec_query_plan(plan_handle) qp WHERE cp.usecounts = 1;
